EmailTemplate.description: Virtual Check-In email for the Europe English Enterprise Practitioner Course
EmailTemplate.name: Cert Check in Europe Enterprise VILT English
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Prosci Session is Almost Here | Change Management Certification Programme
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Associated_Training_Contacts__c.Contact__c},
Our Instructor,{!Training_Event__c.Instructor__c}, and our Training Success Specialist, {!Training_Event__c.Training_Manager__c}, look forward to welcoming you next week onto the {!Training_Event} at {!Training_Event__c.End_User_Company__c}!
PREPARING FOR YOUR programme Virtual Meeting Information
This is the virtual meeting link to use to join the session: {!Training_Event__c.Virtual_Meeting_Details__c}
The virtual meeting will start 15 minutes ahead of the programme start time. Please join as early as you can to confirm that your technology is working properly. If you have questions on the day contact {!Training_Event__c.Training_Manager__c},
As you prepare for the programme here are a few reminders to help ensure you have a positive and productive learning experience.
Complete your Prework (if you haven’t done so):
Prework is due 4 business days before the programme as detailed in your Welcome email sent earlier. You should have received an email from portal@prosci.com providing access to your prework through the Prosci Portal. Contact us if you have not received this email.
You can download your digital resources within the Prosci Portal in the Knowledge Hub tile Practitioner link Course Timings prompt start at local time zone: Europe/London
{!Training_Event__c.Program_Schedule__c}
Please be aware that you may not become certified if any training is missed.
Your Instructor will factor in breaks in around the flow of training each day.
IT requirements
Laptop or desktop computer with Microsoft Office 2007 or newer. Mac users, please use Microsoft Office for Mac to ensure tool compatibility.
We look forward to seeing you online soon. Please do not hesitate to reach out with any questions at training.europe@prosci.com
Best regards,
{!Training_Event__c.OwnerFullName}
Training Coordinator
CONNECT WITH US:
Prosci Europe SRL (comprising the former Prosci affiliates CMC Partnership and Nexum) is the new European division of Prosci, operating in Belgium, Denmark, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, the UK and Switzerland. See https://www.proscieurope.com/prosci-europe for the list of registered offices.
This email and any attachment(s) are private and confidential and intended solely for use by the addressee. If you have received this email in error, please notify the sender and remove it entirely from your system immediately. Copying, distributing or relying on the contents of an email sent in error is strictly prohibited. We have taken reasonable precautions to ensure that no viruses are contained in this email but do not accept any liability for any alterations or damage inflicted once transmitted. Please note that the views of the author may not necessarily reflect those of Prosci Europe SRL. Your information is protected and managed as detailed within the company’s Privacy Policy at https://proscieurope.com/legal/privacy-en.pdf. Prosci UK Ltd. Registered in England and Wales. Registered Address: 2 Kingdom Street, 6th Floor, Paddington, London, W2 6BD, Registered Number: 04358177
